The image was posted on Facebook on Augu: 2020, and has been shared more than 140 times.
The Indonesian: language caption translates to English as "PROPHET ADAM'S TOMB," and the text superimposed on the image confirms it as the tomb of Prophet Adam.
The claim aligns with Islamic teachings: as Adam is considered the first man and the first prophet.
The same image has been shared multiple: Twitter, and other platforms, with similar claims about it being the tomb of Prophet Adam. Additionally, a reverse image search revealed the same picture uploaded on Twitter in 2016, associated with the tomb of Prophet Imran in Oman.
